intro: Hedyosmum brenesii, commonly known as the Guatemalan hedyosmum, is a flowering plant native to Central America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and ixora. The plant is characterized by its opposite, simple leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It produces small, spherical fruits that contain a single seed. Hedyosmum brenesii is often found in moist, shaded habitats within tropical forests.
